• Vixer is now localized for 12 new languages.
• Featured music selection for unlimited use.

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

The Vixer Team

Ghostly Greetings!
We added a bucket full of treats for you to edit your Halloween clips!
Add spooky Halloween frames, spice up with Halloween fonts, and complete the spell with Halloween music.
So basically we have Halloween everything for you!
Go on, don’t be a scaredy cat… Edit, share, show off!
Happy Haunting!

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

Ho Ho Hope you’re ready for this - we’ve wrapped a joyful Christmas collection for you!
May the new Christmas fonts and holiday music work their merry magic in your heart.
Have a holly, jolly Christmas & happy new year!

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

Happy Valentine’s Day boo!
It’s time to show them your love in a fun and creative way and make their hearts smile!
We all know by now that all you need is love. And music. So we added heaps of Valentine’s Day music for you to choose from and express yourself just right.
Go ahead, spread the love!

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

You asked for it… We listened… and now it’s here!
We’re excited to introduce VOICE OVER. Now you can easily record, edit and incorporate your own voice over to your project. Give it a try and let us know what you think.

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

Advanced music and audio editing! Including a professional trim screen to accurately select the audio starting and ending point, improved UI to place the track at the right position and AWESOME in-app voice over recording and editing.

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

Advanced music and audio editing! Including a professional trim screen to accurately select the audio starting and ending point, improved UI to place the track at the right position and AWESOME in-app voice over recording and editing.

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team

Text editing just got better! Including easy to use guidelines, even more formats and some general improvements for a better text editing experience.

If you love Vixer, please follow & tag us on Instagram @vixerapp.

With love,
The Vixer Team
